Remote Access Distributed Fiile System

Jan. 2020 - Apr. 2020

- Through applying distributed system principle, developed remote-access file system in Linux enviroment, which allows multiple clients to access to files on the remote server at the same time with upload download mode.

- Implemented “stat, touch, vi, echo, cat” Linux commands to create, read, write and get attributes of remote files by designing new RPC protocals.

- Integrated the function enabling multiple clients to read a file concurrently and allowing only one single client to modify it via mutual lock mechanism.

- Applied both cache timeout and last modify time check to ensure the file’s freshness whenever the client accesses to it.

- Conducted function tests in Python and deployed automatic system tests in ssh.
